title: Joshua in a box
creator_credit: Stephen Bosustow Productions and John Lange
brief_description: An animated film which uses the situation of a boy being trapped in a box as a basis for a study of needs, emotions and values. No commentary, music and sound effects only.
description: An animated film which uses the situation of a boy being trapped in a box as a basis for a study of needs, emotions and values. No commentary, music and sound effects only.
